Name: Burning Bush shot(s)
Ingredients: 4 drop Hot pepper sauce (red vinegar-based e.g. Tabasco)
Instructions: POUR tequila into chilled glass and then drop Tabasco over the top. This will sink through the tequila.
Review: The Mexicans are fans of hot pepper sauce, although they probably would not condone this way of drinking tequila.
Nutrition: One serving of Burning Bush shot(s) contains 66 calories
